x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

 

  • Case Management-manage and route confidential reports.
  • Flow Designer - automate triage to appropriate responders.
  • Knowledge Base-provide verified resources and survivor guides.
  • Virtual Agent -confidential chatbot for safe, discreet interaction.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Data encryption, anonymous login, no phone/email required, geolocation for nearby support centers, and multi-language support.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring data confidentiality and user trust.
  • Potential impact (measurable):
  • 500+ survivors receive timely help
  • Increased public awareness of GBV reporting options
  • Supports SDG 5 (Gender Equality)
